title: (x) Suavicremas ice cream logo - Khaki {Ben Archer}
content:
can anyone tell me if this font is commercially available?

i'm pretty sure it's a complete character set, as there is more text set with it elsewhere on the package.

thanks,

tyler

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [suavicrema.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415101009/http:/typophile.com/files/suavicrema.jpg) | 101.03 KB |
author: tyleryoung

comments.content:
Yes. And you probably own a copy of it already. That is [Khaki](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415101009/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/khaki/) with the spots knocked off and a slight horizontal squoosh™.

AFAIK, it was bundled free with either OS or browser software a few years back.

sweet. thanks ben.

they really cleaned up the ragged edges of all the letterforms though, aside from using the 'splotchless' version of the font. i much prefer the smooth lines in the custom version.

thanks again for your help!
